mapper.select: SELECT g.GROUP_CODE, g.GROUP_NAME, p.id, p.PERMISSION_URL, p.PERMISSION_KEY, p.PERMISSION_GROUP, p.PERMISSION_ACTION, p.DESCRIPTION FROM xmo_permission p, xmo_group g, xmo_group_permission gp WHERE gp.GROUP_ID = g.ID AND gp.PERMISSION_ID = p.ID
SELECT g.GROUP_CODE, g.GROUP_NAME, g.ID FROM xmo_user u, xmo_group g, xmo_user_group ug WHERE ug.GROUP_ID = g.ID AND ug.USER_ID = u.ID AND u.DISABLE = 0 AND u.ID = #{userId}
